chart.title: Global warming contributions by gas and source
chart.subtitle: The global mean surface temperature change as a result of the cumulative emissions of three gases – carbon dioxide, methane, and nitrous oxide.
chart.note: This does not include cooling impacts from sulphur dioxide and aerosols, so the net warming can be lower.
